item.title: 【Helpdesk】Help! sharemania doesn't let me post at any requests section
item.description:
Hi! Today I was about to request something that I can't find but when I go to requests section I can't post anything there and it's giving me this warning:
(You have insufficient privileges to post here.)
Am I the only one who banned from requests or is it closed for everyone else?

If it's only me can any of you tell me where can I contact any active moderator? I want to know why this happened to me.
item.author: Britneyssbloverr
